sentence: Watkins told VICE News that while at the rally he had tried to speak to Arizona state Rep. Mark Finchem, who has promoted QAnon conspiracies, and who is seeking election in November as secretary of state.
author: David Gilbert
title: QAnon Thought Leader Ron Watkins Is Running for Congress. It’s Going Terribly.

sentence: Two Republican state lawmakers — Pennsylvania senator Doug Mastriano and Arizona senator Mark Finchem — also received subpoenas from Mr Thompson on Monday.
author: Andrew Feinberg
title: Capitol riot committee subpoenas Trump campaign officials and state lawmakers involved in sham elector plot

sentence: Trump campaign official Michael Roman, in charge of Election Day operations in 2020, and his deputy Gary Michael Brown, will receive a subpoena, as will Republican state lawmakers from Pennsylvania and Arizona – Douglas Mastriano and Mark Finchem, respectively.
title: Biden rejects Trump's executive privilege claim and orders the release of ALL White House visitor logs to the January 6 committee
